title: LGBTQ persons can open joint bank account: FinMin advisory
description: The finance ministry has clarified that there are no restrictions for LGBTQ individuals to open joint bank accounts or nominate partners in a queer relationship as nominees. This advisory follows a Supreme Court order from October 2023. The Reserve Bank of India has also issued guidance to all banks on this matter.
